title: Bug 2940: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) and no busy cursor is shown.
OB: It takes a significant amount of time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. Additionally, no busy cursor is shown during this process.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it should complete more quickly and a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate progress.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Go to the Export Zip feature. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose some file types and press 'Ok'.
